text: In the theme.json I have disabled the default HubSpot modules by the following code: `"hide_all_default_modules": true` I haven't found anything in the docs, but is it possible to also disable the sections and layouts?

Hi Menno â€“ I believe you can only disable sections within a template:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/hide-modules-and-sections>
